messages.message: @Xindi Xu some cypress ci tests are failing because the new community accounts run out of units on retries eg 11724 (https://cloud.cypress.io/projects/cfhedy/runs/11724/overview?roarHideRunsWithDiffGroupsAndTags=1) and 11727 (https://cloud.cypress.io/projects/cfhedy/runs/11727/overview/d6aa76ff-deb4-4510-ac59-69e009eb9a02?roarHideRunsWithDiffGroupsAndTags=1)
when this happened before i would just add more units, but i guess we can't do this now we have new accounts per pr
True, I didn't expect that we have tests that consume a ton of units...
idk what's happening hereâ€”is it that units aren't getting added in the first place? but i thought we already fixed that
We'll switch to pay as you go mode for community users by the end of the quarter so hopefully this won't be an issue.
wait, which test that has new community users running out of credit? I'm seeing the existing support-testing+1 user ran out of credit
wait, these are the existing users?
oh you are right. i'll just add units
I checked PR 59142 and the user has a lot of units left so we should be good here :slightly_smiling_face:!
